page.title: 07CLOTHES WORN IN NEWBRIDGE
page.content: When we went out we did a survey on Clothes.We found out that people mostly wear jeans or trousers and they also feel comfortable in jeans and a jumper.They mostly wear black and they buy most of their clothes from Topman/Topshop.In our area most teenagers make their own decision about what they buy.If it is a child the mum normally makes the choice of the clothes that they wear.People nowadays do not mind if the colours that they are wearing contrast or if they are not in the fashion. In Hillwood Primary 14 boys wear school uniform and only 7 girls.We think this is because boys usually wear a shirt with a collar which looks odd without a tie.
